results.title: Dune: Part Two
results.description: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family.

results.title: Oppenheimer
results.description: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb during World War II.

results.title: Inside Out 2
results.description: Riley navigates teenage emotions as new feelings arrive at headquarters—including Anxiety, Envy, and Embarrassment.

results.title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
results.description: Miles Morales goes on an interdimensional adventure with other Spider-People to face a new powerful villain.

results.title: The Batman
results.description: Batman ventures into Gotham's underworld when a sadistic killer leaves behind a trail of cryptic clues.

results.title: Top Gun: Maverick
results.description: After more than 30 years of service, Maverick returns to train a new generation of elite Top Gun graduates.

results.title: Mission: Impossible – Dead Reckoning Part One
results.description: Ethan Hunt and the IMF team race against time to track down a deadly new weapon that threatens humanity.

results.title: Barbie
results.description: Barbie begins a journey of self-discovery after experiencing a crisis that challenges her world and identity.

results.title: Poor Things
results.description: A young woman brought back to life by a brilliant scientist embarks on a fantastical journey of self-liberation.

results.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
results.description: The Guardians must protect Rocket from a powerful enemy while confronting painful secrets of his past.
